text:
saya menginap 2 malam di hotel ini pas lagi libur lebaran, pesen lewat online. ulasan ini untuk deluxe room di lantai 5. 
1. kamar : deluxe room luas 15 m2 dengan twin bed, rada sempit, cuma buat tidur oke lah. tidak ada lemari es di kamar. lemari tanpa pintu. colokan listrik kurang banyak.
2. kebersihan : standar, ada bercak2 noda kuning di sprei, warna sprei putih kusam.
3. kamar mandi : amenitis (sikat gigi) harus diminta, disediakan shampo dan sabun (2in1) jadi ga tau ini lebih untuk sabun atau sampo. malam pertama, saya mandi jam 22, air panasnya tidak panas. pas pagi, air panasnya oke.  
4. wifi : parah, lelet, on off ga jelas, terpaksa ngandelin tethering dari HP.
5. breakfast : lumayan variatif dengan rasa standar, ada sate, lontong, spageti, nasgor, roti, dll
6. check in : lancar, tapi agak aneh petugas minta saya harus deposit KTP sbg jaminan (akan dikembalikan saat cek out), padahal udah bayar lunas. kebayangkan pergi kemana2 ga bawa KTP. setelah  sedikit ngotot, akhirnya saya ga perlu deposit KTP.  
7. parkir : terbatas, tapi bisa titip kunci ke sekuriti untuk parkir nginap. keamanan terjamin. 
8. ketenangan : oke

text:
Serela Waringin berjarak hanya sekitar 15 menit berkendara dari Stasiun Kereta Api Bandung, menawarkan sebuah kolam renang outdoor, fasilitas rapat/perjamuan, dan akses WiFi gratis di area umum dan kamar-kamarnya.

Jalan Braga yang terkenal dengan jalan perbelanjaan dan kulinernya, berjarak hanya sekitar 15 menit berkendara dari hotel, sementara Institut Teknologi Bandung dapat dicapai dalam waktu sekitar 20 menit berkendara. Bandara Internasional Husein Sastranegara berjarak sekitar 20 menit perjalanan dengan mobil.

Kamar-kamar ber-AC yang nyaman di Hotel Serela Waringin menawarkan area tempat duduk, lemari, TV kabel layar datar, dan kamar mandi dalam yang dilengkapi dengan fasilitas shower dan perlengkapan mandi gratis.

Fasilitas lain yang akan Anda temukan di hotel ini antara lain meja depan 24 jam, layanan kamar, dan penitipan bagasi gratis. Layanan binatu dan dry cleaning juga tersedia dengan biaya tambahan. Akomodasi ini menyediakan tempat parkir bagi yang datang dengan kendaraan.

Untuk bersantap, restoran hotel menyajikan hidangan Asia dan Indonesia untuk sarapan, makan siang & makan malam.

title: The hotel is not bad

text:
Sebenarnya sering menginap dihotel ini, tetapi karena pengalaman terakhir kesini kurang menyenangkan jadi hampir 2 tahunan saya tidak menginap disini. Tetapi karena ada urusan didaerah pasirkaliki akhirnya saya coba menginap kembali disini. pertama saya bandingan harga dari beberapa OTA dan memang ratenya sedang bersahabat. Teapi saya memutuskan untuk mencoba booking via website kagum group, dan ternyata harganya jauh sangat murah dibanding dengan OTA.

Ada sedikit masalah pada saat cek in  karena reservasi saya tidak ada, padahal saya booking dibawah jam 12 dan cek in sekitar jam 3. Sehingga saya harus mengirimkan bukti transfer saya ke email hotel Serala waringin. 

Untuk kondisi kamar sempurna. kecil tapi bersih dan rapih, dengan pencahayaan yang bagus serta banyak kaca menjadikan ruangan terasa luas. kamar mandi bersih dan handuk bersih serta wangi. tetapi untuk sikat gigi hanya 1 begitupun dengan sandal, dan kemana perginya body lotion yang biasanya tersedia.

untuk wifi kurang kencang dan siaran tv banyak yang tidak tersedia serta tidak jernih banya semut. 

Secara keseluruhan untuk kali ini saya sangat puas dan pasti akan kembali dalam waktu dekat.
title: Kembali lagi

text:
Hotel yg lokasinya dekat dengan wisata China town Bandung,bisa jalan kaki.
Kamarnya kecil dan sempit dengan harga standar. Namun terdapat fasilitas hairdryer di kamar. AC nya tidak dingin,sehingga kita sering keringetan di kamar.
title: Hotel dekat dengan China town Bandung

text: Awalnya ke sini atas rekomendasi temen-temen. Emang sih tempatnya dekat pusat kota (samping chinatown persis), tapi mau nyampe sini macet karena harus nembus braga. Kesan pertama, kamarnya kurang bersih, kaca berjamur dibiarin aja, tempat parkir terbatas, dan pas sarapan saya terlalu over ekspektasi karena ada yang bilang makanannya enak, realitanya standar hotel bintang 2 dari segi rasa dan kelengkapan. Yah paling ga mereka punya kolam renang buat lengkap-lengkap. Kesimpulan ni hotel ga cocok untuk family trip, tapi buat traveler sendirian atau sama temen boleh lah meski masih ada better choice sih selain di sini.
title: Ga sesuai ekspektasi

text:
Saya menginap di lantai 5.
Lokasi strategis,tepat disamping hotel terdapat mini market dan atm.
Staff sangat ramah.
Room tidak terlalu kecil tapi tidak luas juga.Sesuai dengan harga yang ditawarkan.
Dari jendela hotel bisa melihat chinatown,karena posisinya sangat dekat dengan chinatown.
Untuk makanan saya tidak sempat mencoba karena saya terlambat bangun.
Sayang sekali saya hanya menginap 1 hari padahal saya ingin mencoba fasilitas spa yang di tawarkan.
title: Comfortable

text: Lokasinya cukup strategis di area jl klenteng,di sebelah kiri terdapat indomaret dan cukup jalan kaki untuk ke lokasi chinatown. namun sayang kamarnya sempit hanya cukup untuk kasur saja. untuk fasilitas di kamar standar seperti hotel lainnya, yaitu lcd tv, air mineral, kopi, teh, pemanas air. Ac nya sangat dingin apalagi saat malam hari. Untuk kamar mandi juga standar, hanya saja airnya agak keruh dan bau pada saat ngeflush. Air panas di kamar mandi berfungsi dengan baik, terdapat hairdryer, handuk, sabun, sikat gigi. parkirannya juga tidak terlalu luas jadi kami diminta untuk menitipkan kunci mobil kepada security.

text: Berlokasi di jalan Kelenteng, sebenarnya hotel ini tidak perlu obral harga. Hotel bintang 3 ini mematok harga bintang 2, yang berarti harganya sama atau malah kadang di bawah harga budget hotel. Awalnya saya tidak curiga, namun nama besar Kagum Grup membuat saya tanpa ragu memesan hotel ini. Kecurigaan saya berawal ketika saya melakukan proses check in. Saya melakukan pemesanan melalui situs Booking.com dan dikatakan oleh petugas front office bahwa pesanan saya tidak ada. Setelah memakan waktu setengah jam lebih baru dokumen pemesanan saya ditemukan di kantor mereka. Ukuran kamar pun kurang lebih sama dengan ukuran kamar pada budget hotel. Menu sarapan pun hanya sedikit variasinya. Mungkin hanya fasilitas kopi teh di kamar dan variasi menu sarapan yang membedakan dengan budget hotel. Oh, mungkin satu lagi, di hotel ini ada kolam renang, hanya saja dilihat dari bentuk dan ukurannya lebih mirip kolam ikan daripada kolam renang. Terakhir, wifi gratisnya pun tidak bisa dinikmati di kamar. Karena anehnya tidak ada sinyal.,
title: Lokasi strategis, fasilitas minim

owner_response.text:
Kepada yang terhormat Bapak Patrick,

Perkenankan saya mewakili manajemen Serela Waringin Hotel Bandung untuk pertama-tama mengucapkan terima kasih yang sebesar-besarnya kepada Bapak Patrick yang telah memilih Hotel kami untuk mengenap. Kedua, saya hendak pula mengajukan permintaan maaf yang sedalam-dalamnya atas segala bentuk ketidak-nyamanan yang telah dialami oleh Bapak Patrick ketika menginap bersama kami. Saya pastikan segala kritik yang bapak ajukan akan kami infokan segera kepada yang terkait supaya dapat diperbaiki untuk ke depannya.

Salam hangat,,
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Berkunjung untuk transit karena kemalaman , ketika datang disambut dengan staff yang ramah , lokasi sekitar dengan minimarket namun sayang hanya buka sampai jam 10 malam . overall kondisi kamar rapih dan nyaman sayang toilet agak sedikit bau
title: Harga Murah Lokasi Strategis

owner_response.text:
Kepada yang terhormat Bapak Dwi,

Perkenankan saya mewakili manajemen Serela Waringin Hotel Bandung untuk mengucapkan terima kasih kepada Bapak Dwi yang telah menginap bersama kami. Kami mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanan yang bapak alami dikarenakan oleh aroma di dalam kamar mandi yang kurang baik, akan dipastikan hal ini menjadi prioritas utama untuk diatasi supaya tamu-tamu kami dapat menginap dengan lebih nyaman ke depannya.

Kami tunggu kehadiran Bapak Dwi kembali bersama kami.

Salam hangat,
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Untuk kesekian kalinya saya menginap di serela waringin ini. Saya suka dengan hotel ini karena tempatnya nyaman, tenang dan strategis.  Bangunan hotel juga terlihat masih baru dan modern. Suasana kamar sangat nyaman. Walaupun kecil tapi sangat nyaman dan rapi. Tapi sayang setelah sekian lama saya tidak menginap disini saya merasa tidak berkesan dengan serela waringin. Pertama saya minta kamar dengan ranjang yg double dan saya bersedia menunggu sampai siap, tetapi tetap dapat 2 ranjang dan menurut saya dua ranjang dangat sempit, kamar 505 kamar mandinya sangat sempit dan shower rusak, tempat penyimpanan juga kurang bagus. Siaran tv jadi banyak semutnya padahal tiap saya menginap disini siaran tv tidak ada masalah. Tapi ada perkembangan yang sangat bagus. Sekarang wifi sudah masuk kamar, ini yang saya tunggu- tunggu. Kolam renang kecil tapi sangat nyaman untuk digunakan. Sarapan lumayan menuaskan, tapi penyimpanan lauk pauknya ga banget. Tapi selebihnya okelah.
title: Sedikit kecewa

owner_response.text:
Kepada yang terhormat Bapak Soni,

Perkenankan saya mewakili manajemen Serela Waringin Hotel Bandung untuk mengucapkan permintaan maaf yang sebesar-besarnya atas setiap dan segala ketidaknyamanan yang dialami oleh Bapak Soni ketika terakhir menginap bersama kami. Saya pastikan bahwa seluruh keluhan Bapak Soni disampaikan kepada orang-orang yang terkait supaya untuk ke depannya bisa lebih baik lagi dalam berbagai hal.

Salam hangat
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Desember tahun lalu, kami mendapatkan kesempatan liburan ke Bandung, saat mendapatkan voucher hotel ini (dengan budget sekitar Rp 450.000, kelihatannya hotel kecil dengan layanan biasa.
Namun, nyatanya kepuasan beristirahat disini tidak ada bandingannya (dari sekian menginap di Bandung).
Tempat tidur yang ekstra nyaman, suasana Bandung yang sejuk, resepsionis yang layaknya sahabat. 
Thanks Serela, I'll be back in a year.
title: Hotel denga layanan bintang empat. Value, prestige and joyful.

text:
Saya menginap di serela Waringin di bulan Juni Lalu Bersama Teman saya barupertama masuk hotel saya di suguhi senyuman ramah dari Resevsionisnya dan proses masuk kamar yang cepat dan saya tidak terlalu lama menunggu.
setelah masuk kamar saya lihat terlihat sempurna walau pun minimalis kamarnya tetapi saya suka dan hotel ini ternyata dekat dengan kuliner dan tidak susah cari apapun menurut saya trimakasih serela waringin dan untuk staf nya terutama resevsionis nya yang selalu memberikan solusi terhadap apa yang saya butuh kan sekali lagi terima kasih serea waringin.
title: Harga yang terjangkau Dan Peelayanan yang memuaskan

text: Kamar di serela nyaman dan bersih dengan harga yang terjangkau, hanya peralatan mandi seperti sikat gigi odol cuma disediakan untuk 1 orang saja. Tapi untuk keseluruhan hotel serela waringi sudah ok..
title: Good

text:
Saya menginap pda tanggal 29-30juli 2016.
Yang namanya hotel budget gini deh hehe. Kamar rada sempit terus wifi connecting ( poor ) overall swimming pool nya ok . Yang bikin lucu pas saya iseng2 cek kolong bed ada tissue basah.itu gatau dari pihak spv hk atau QS hotel yang tidak cek secara detail. Mohon kedepan nya semoga lebih baik lagi .
title: Hotel budget ...

text: Lokasinya dekat dengan martabak andir, paskal food market, stasiun. Namun kamarnya sangat sempit, tidak cocok untuk keluarga, budget hotel dengan fasilitas terbatas. Handuknya juga kotor, kamar mandi gelap. Wifi tidak lancar.
title: Kamar kecil dan handuk kotor

text: Saya berlibur bersama keluarga dan teman2 di Bandung, saya sempat menyewa 3 kamar ranjang twin, pelayanan hotel cukup ramah, kamar agak sempit apalagi saya dan keluarga menginap di 1 kamar, tapi dengan tarif yang sesuai. Fasilitas hotel ada kolam renang di lantai 1, untuk breakfast menu yg ditawarkan cukup enak, ada nasi goreng, kwetiaw goreng, ayam, capcay dlsbnya. Tempat parkir agak terbatas, dan lokasi hotel bersebelahan dengan kelenteng, namun lokasi dekat dengan pusat kuliner gadujati.
title: Lokasi dekat kuliner

text:
Nginep dsni dpt promo murah sih cm byr 268k udh dpt kamar deluxe,kamarnya bersih pas ddpn lift,dapet indovision chanel yg premium,bgs sih..
cuma syg pas breakfast liat menu makanan si kyk di hotel2 bintang,ada roti,bubur,nasi kuning,makanan prasmanan cm dapet nasgor,migor,nasi putih,sop,kakap asam manis..nyobain aneka roti yg terhampar ah zonk,ternyata roti udh keras dan rasa ga enak kyk roti udh lama..huftt
Sayang ya fasilitas udh bgs di harapkan utk segi breakfast dpt rsa makanan yg berkualitas jg..
Oia ini hotel deket paskal food market..lmyn lah buat nkrg lho..
title: Breakfast tampilannya enak,rasa gak bgtt!!

text:
- Waktu kami datang dalam keadaan hujan, tidak ada staff security yg in-charge di dpn sehingga driver kami sendiri yang membantu mencarikan payung, tidak lama kemudian security hotel datang membantu membawakan barang2 kami.
- Kami mendapatkan kamar yang bau rokok dan akhirnya dibantu staff FO dicarikan kamar yang lebih nyaman.
- Showernya tidak dapat berfungsi untuk mengatur air panas dan dingin.
- Kekurangan stop kontak dan kami sempat request colokan T tetapi tidak tersedia. Jadi harus antri kalau mau charge hp :D
- Jarak antara stop kontak dan colokan kettle terlalu sempit, sehingga agak sulit untuk mencolokkan ke stop kontak.
- Bed sheet kurang bersih, ada spot noda.
- Toilet paper dan sabun tidak di refill pada saat make-up room.
- Staff hotel ramah dan dan cukup membantu.
- Cocok untuk tamu yang tidak suka keramaian.
- Harga cukup murah. Saya booking via traveloka dan mendapatkan harga 350rb'an sudah termasuk breakfast.
title: Budget hotel with a good price :)

text: Bagi yang membawa kendaraan utk parkiran terbatas, solusi yg diterapkan, kunci dititipkan pada petugas sehingga memudahkan pemindahan kendaraan apabil diperlukan. Informasi dari front Office bahwa tidak ada kamar yg berhubungan (connecting room). Perlu deposit untuk kunci sebesar Rp. 100rb pada saat check in. Lift 1, kamar superior kecil dgn ukuran sekitar 15m2, kamar mandi kecil, tidak ada kulkas, lantai dengan karpet, ada teko pembuat teh, interior cukup baik, colokan hanya 2 satu dkt tempat tidur dan satu di meja untuk teko, pemandangan keluar kamar dari kmr 211 dan 212 atap rumah warga. Sarapan lumayan namun tidak variatif, jumlah meja di restoran untuk sarapan terbatas. kolam renang berada dekat restoran berukuran kurang lebih 10x3 m. Khusus bagi yg membawa anak2 untuk sarapan usia anak 9 tahun dikategorikan dewasa, dan untuk anak 6 tahun diminta untuk membayar setengah (Rp. 50rb). Pembayaran dilakukan di restoran pada saat sarapan. Not recomended untuk keluarga dengan anak2 dengan luas kamar yg terbatas. Lokasi dekat kelenteng, ada minimarket dekat hotel, untuk makanan lain terdapat paskal food market yg cukup terkenal dengan aneka jajanan dan makanan dengan jarak kurang lebih 1 km dari hotel dengan berkendara.
title: Just ok..

text:
Berikut menurut saya

+ AC sangat dingin
+ Kamar nyaman
+ Fasilitas lengkap (bahkan ada kompor portabel)

- Kamar mandi sempit
- Ragam masakan banyak (sayang rasa masakan tidak jadi hal utama, pastry keras)
- perlengkapan mandi kurang memadai
title: Serela Waringin

text: Pelayanan oleh staff ramah,namun kurang cepat pada saat kami ingin di clear up piring kotor di kamar,serta untuk makanan yang di sajikan melalui room service tidak special terutama waktu pengantaran yang cukup lama,electricity perlu menjadi concern karena sempat keluar ASAP dari tempat listrik dikarenakan travel adapter yang memang di lem oleh pihak engineering yang jika panas dapat menyebabkan keluar nya asap,lokasi dekat dengan tempat wisata,serta kuliner.
title: Lebih ditingkatkan

text: Ini kunjungan pertama saya di kota Bandung, Serela waringin jadi pilihan saya, pelayanan OK buanget, semua staff ramah 😘 dekat mau kemana mana, apalagi kalau mau ke Alun Alun hanya butuh waktu 5 menit berkendara, Paris Van Java, dekat juga dengan pasar Baru hanya 2 menit berkendara. Hanya saja hotel ini berada di Klenteng (lingkungan orang china) jadi bagi saya seorang muslim rada susah mencari makanan yang halal, tapi its oke sambil jalan aja cari makannya . Jika ke bandung Next time bakal ke Serela lagi , terimakasih Serela 😉
title: Hotel murah pelayanan bintang 5

text:
Pertama kali nginep disini, dapat kamar di lantai 5 depan lift
kamarnya sempit, tapi nyaman banget wifi juga ok,sarapannya enak banyak variasinya,
kamarnya juga tenang, sesuai pesanana lah. tapi yang agak gak suka lingkungan sekitar cari makan susah karena tidak di rekomendasikan utnuk yang beragama muslin

handuk nya saja sudah tidak layak pakai

text: Pertama kali menginap..jalanan menuju hotel jadi harus memutar dikarenakan ada pasar kuliner(yg seharusnya dekat menjadi jauh dan macet)lokasi di dalam gang dan lahan parkir yg sempit. Kamar ukurannya kecil tetapi bed nya nyaman serta wifi ok. Yg kurang ok kolam renang...seperti kolam ikan..
title: Bed comfort, wifi ok,check in lama, dekat paskal,parkir sempit

text:
Kondisi kamar cukup bersih, walapun mmg size kamar yg terlalu kecil. Breakfast cukup variatif hanya kebersihan nya saja yg perlu di tingkatkan. Soalnya suka ada smacam semut/binatang kecil di makanan. 
Untuk lokasi lumaya stategis krn di sekitar ada banyak yg jual makanan.
title: Liburan di bandung

text: hotel ini nyaman lengkap dengan kolam renang dan restoran, breakfast dengan banyak pilihan variasi, lokasi lumayan strategis, kamar kecil serba kecil tetapi nyaman, fasiltas kamar lumayan lengkap dan tertata rapi, channer tv banyak.
title: kamar nyaman dan bersih

text: Untuk yg punya budget pas2an hotel ini sangat lah cocok karena di lengkapi dengan kolam renang, kamar sangat sesuai dengan budget bersih dan nyaman sarapan walaupun tidak banyak variasinya namun rasanya sangat lezat depan hotel ada mini market dan untuk mencari makan malam tidak lah susah karena pada malam hari banyak penjual makanan
title: Bintang 3 yg nyaman

text: Kamar disini cukup baik dan bersih dengan harga yang sangat terjangkau. Memang tidak di tengah kota, tapi istirahat menjadi tenang karena tidak bising dari luar hotel. Makanan juga oke. Hanya saja wifi nya tidak sampai ke kamar, saya menginap di kamar 350 dan wifi tidak terdetect sama sekali.
title: Nice budget hotel

text:
Kembali mencoba menginap di salah satu hotelnya KAGUM Hotel. Sejak 2013 sudah sering menginap di hotelnya KAGUM, meski kini beberapa hotel yang dulu pernah diinapi sudah tidak di bawah manajemen KAGUM Hotel lagi.

Serela Waringin Hotel, membawa brand Serela. Berarti kelasnya kisaran hotel menengah, bukan kelas hotel budget sebagaimana Zodiak. Menariknya, rate yang ditawarkan tidak jauh beda. Malah di beberapa online travel agent, jadi lebih murah dari Zodiak.

Berlokasi di jalan Kelenteng, tidak terlalu jauh dari Stasiun Bandung, dekat dengan Paskal Hyper. Menimbang lokasi yang mudah akses transportasi publik, maka ya bolehlah. Kalau pakai kendaraan pribadi pun tidak perlu khawatir, area parkir dirasa cukup luas. Hanya memang kawasannya cukup sering macet.

Lobi yang luas dengan beberapa kursi kayu. Proses check in saya agak memakan waktu, entah karena terhambat di online travel agent atau dimana. Biasanya sih, meski booking last minute, check in bisa segera diproses.

Mendapat kunci kamar 326 setelah menyerahkan deposit Rp 100.000 yang akan dikembalikan saat check out. Lift yang tersedia hanya satu, kalau kamarnya di lantai yang ga tinggi sih bisa naik tangga.

Kamarnya hanya seluas 15 meter persegi yang interiornya padat. Hampir tidak ada ruang kosong. Fasilitas standar hotel lengkap tersedia. Lumayanlah.

Kamar mandi cukup sempit, tapi masih bisa leluasa gerak asal hati-hati. Toiletries yang disediakan cukup lengkap kecuali ketiadaan sabun cair. Handuknya meski saya yakin bersih, namun penampilannya sedikit kusam.

Hiburan di kamar hanya ada TV kabel dengan 40 channel. Beberapa channel hilang dan kurang baik gambarnya. Kalau internet? Jangan berharap dulu. Katanya sedang tak bisa digunakan bila di dalam kamar. Hanya bisa di lobi atau restoran.

Meski hotel kecil, tapi fasilitas cukup lengkap. Tersedia ruang pertemuan, layanan pijat dan area kolam renang meski kecil. Entah ada yang biasa berenang di sana atau enggak hehehe.

Sarapan juga tersedia di restoran lantai 1. Menunya ya cukup beragam meski nampak kosong. Banyak ruang yang mungkin dulu terisi menu tapi kini kosong begitu saja. Dari segi rasa, tidak ada yang istimewa. Namun menimbang harga, maka ya sangat lumayan.

Proses check out cepat dan singkat, jangan lupa menyerahkan kuitansi deposit agar uang kita dikembalikan.

Sebagai hotel di bawah manajemen KAGUM Hotel, untuk mengusung nama Serela ya mungkin terlalu berat. Memang saya membandingkan dengan Serela Cihampelas atau Serela Merdeka yang ratenya lebih mahal, tapi ketiadaan wifi kemudian saluran TV kurang baik, serta rasa sarapan yang mengecewakan mungkin bisa jadi catatan.

Semoga bisa jadi lebih baik, mengingat Serela Waringin ini cukup banyak peminatnya. Soalnya ramai sih pas saya menginap. :)
title: Serela yang Terjangkau

text: Long weekend februari kemarin saya menginap di hotel ini bersama beberapa sahabat. Lokasinya cukup jauh dari pusat keramaian dan wisata alam bandung. Parkirnya penuh, saya harus parkir kendaraan diluar hotel. Untuk fasilitas dihotel dan dikamarnya saya rasa cukup. Sarapannya juga bervariasi. Kekurangan hanya di bathroom nya yg sangat kecil menurut saya.
title: Lumayan

text: Pertama kalinya menginap dihotel ini, pelayanan sangat baik, proses check in cepat. Kamar dan Parkiran agak sempit. Tapi untuk parkiran kebetulan mungkin hotel sedang sepi jd tidak terlalu jd masalah. Sayangnya selama menginap saya tidak sempat breakfast krn telat bangun, sebenemarnya ada staff yang membangunkan untuk mengingatkan jam tutup breakfast, tapi karena kami kelelehan jadi kami biarkan meleeatkan breakfast kami. Jadi tidak bisa berkomentar tentang variasi menu nya. Tapi dijamin memuaskan kok disini pelayanannya baik.
title: Quick Service Hotel But Small Room

text:
Saya menginap pada tanggal 31 Januari 2016, di kamar 310 berikut ulasan saya : 

1. LOKASI RATING 8
Lokasi hotel ini di jalan kelenteng, tidak begitu jauh dari pusat kota, dan alun alun bandung. Sekitar hotel ada minimarket dan penjual makanan sehingga kalau ada yg perlu dibeli secara mendadak cukup mudah. Untuk muslim harus cukup hati2 membeli makanan di sekitar hotel karena banyak yg jual makanan yg mengandung babi. Tapi ada rumah makan padang di depan hotel yg cukup enak dan murah. Menuju hotel kalau siang kadang cukup macet. 

2. BANGUNAN DAN FASILITAS RATING 8
Bangunan hotel bentuknya moderen dan terawat. Tempat parkir tidak begitu luas. Fasilitas hotel ada restoran dan swimming pool. Swimming poolnya semi indoor. 

3. SERVICE RATING 8
Ketika datang disambut oleh petugas security yg langsung membantu membawa barang2 kami. Proses c.in dan c.out juga cukup cepat. Petugas FO 2 orang cewe saya lupa namanya sangat ramah. 

4. BEDROOM RATING 6
Kamar tidak begitu luas tapi cukuplah buat keluarga kecil. Fasilitas kamar dilengkapi tv flat dengan siaran tv kabel, pemanas air untuk membuat kopi dan teh. Kasur sangat nyaman. Minusnya, ini yg membuat rating kecil kamar tidak ada sandal hotel, ketika diminta hanya dikasih 1 pasang saja. Kemudian ternyata di kamar tidak ada wifi, yang mana jaman sekarang hotel2 kecil pun sudah dilengkapi wifi. Sebenernya ada tapi tidak pernah connect, ketika teknisi datang mereka hanya bilang sebenernya dikamar tidak ada wifi, karena mereka mengakui tidak pernah connect wifi dalam kamar kecuali di lobby dan lantai 1 restaurant. Saya tidak puas dengan jawaban ini karena ketika saya mencoba menanyakan kembali ke reception jawaban reception sama di dalam kamar tidak ada wifi. Lah itu tepat depan kamar saya ada alat penyambung wifi kenapa jg dipasang kalau hanya jadi hiasan. Dan kalau menuliskan info tentang hotel ini di traveloka, atau travel on line lainnya jangan ditulis ada wifi/internet di dalam kamar. Berarti manajemen hotel tidak jujur dalam memberikan info waktu menjual kamar hotel ini. Kemudian telephone juga rusak tapi akhirnya diganti oleh teknisi. 

5. BATH ROOM RATING 6
Kamar mandi kecil. Kemudian handuk keliatan kucel kurang bersih. Di kamar mandi tidak ada keset, sehingga abis mandi air membasahi lantai kamar mandi. Peralatan mandi cukup lengkap dan ada hair dryer. 

5. FOOD AND BAVERAGE RATING 7
Saya memesan spaghetti carbonara, rasanya biasa saja tidak ada yv spesial. 
Kemudian ketika brekafast variasi makanan cukup banyak untuk sekelas bintang 3 termasuk lengkap. Tapi untuk taste biasa aja, masukan kacang ijonya kurang manis hambar.

KESIMPULAN: 
Hotel ini cukup baik sebenernya dan untuk belibur sama keluarga cukup rekomendasi. Staf ramah dan hotelnya cukup nyaman, tapi untuk bisnis atau keperluan meeting seperti di kementerian saya kurang mendukung karena tidak ada internet. Saya akan mencoba kembali menginap disini bersama keluarga saja.
title: Untuk liburan sama keluarga cukup baik, untuk keperluan bisnis not recommended

text: terletak dikota bandung, gak jauh dari stasiun bandung, sy pesen waktu itu udh mlem jam 10 malam, jadi dapat harga yang murah. nyaman, pelayannya ramah dan baik.overall saya suka aja, desain seperti khas serela
title: hotel nyaman

text:
Hotel ini membawa chain brand lokal yang cukup besar.

Lokasi tidak terlalu strategis. Walau dekat dengan stasiun dan beberapa area perbelanjaan tapi lingkungan sekitar hotel agak tidak nyaman. Di sekitar hotel kalau malam agak menyeramkan. Di sebelah hotel tetapi ada minimarket.

Kamar hotel untuk sekelasnya sangatlah sempit (hanya sekitar 15 m2). Jadi walau kamar menggunakan interior yang bagus dan terkesan mewah tapi kurang nyaman karena ukurannya tersebut. Kamar mandi pun demikian.

Amenities tersedia pas-pasan. 

Staf ramah, walau saat check in agak lama.

Bila ada alternatif lain sebaiknya memilih hotel lain untuk kelas yang sama
title: Kamar super sempit

text:
saya booking lewat web dan di situ ada request saya pun request:
1.kamar yang ada di lantai atas.
2.c-in lebih awal karena memang pesawat saya datang pagi,
3.request king bed. 
setelah saya datang awal saya di infokan harus membayar lagi 50%dari harga kamar kalau mau c-in awal dan kalau tidak bayar c-in awal akan tetap jam 12 siang akhirnya saya pun tidak mau bayar,lebih baik menunggu di luar hotel sambil keliling kota bandung.
akhirnya saya datang kembali ke hotel tersebut jam 3 siang dan apa yang terjadi? 1.saya lagi2 tidak dapat kamar yang saya inginkan yaitu lantai atas.
2.kamar yang kotor(carpet full dengan rambut wanita,tembok yang banyak retak dan penuh dengan noda yang beraneka ragam, ada kain di atas tempat tidur dengan noda saos yang masih basah, handuk yang sudah sangat tidak layak alias rusak dan tipis,kamar mandi yang jorok dengan kaca full noda kerak air begitu juga dengan shower tabnya,penerangan yang kurang di kamar mandi).
setelah saya kasih coment ke bagian depan beliau hanya info ke bagian kebersihan hanya untuk ganti handuk. tapi apa yang terjadi ternyata handuk yang datang dengan kualitas yang sama. 
kesimpulan saya supaya kualitas di tingkatkan karena tamu bayar untuk kepuasan bukan seperti yang saya dapati.
title: berpikir lebih kalau mau nginap di hotel ini

photos.caption: contoh dinding yang retak,kalau di foto lebih banyak lagi
kain di atas bed banyak noda saos

text:
Kamarnya nyaman,, kasur juga nyaman, walaupun memang kamarnya sempit. Tp utk sekamar berdua sih fine.
Dekor kamarnya bagus. Modern..
WCnya bersih. Handuk bersih. Air hangat, hair dryer dan AC juga berfungsi dg baik.
Sarapan lumayan bervariasi. Lumayan enak juga tp agak gk konsisten masaknya. Jadi pagi makan empuk bgt dagingnya,, kdua x ambil (berbarengan dengan mbak2nya reffil),, koq alot..
Lalu agak bingung dg front desk. Ramah sih.. Tp kasih harga nambah breakfast koq beda2. Lalu pas pulang juga tb2 ditagih room charge 100rb lalu saya bgg,, dan orgny blg eh iya sudah selesai ya.. Bingung saya..
tp yaa secara kamar,, oke lah,, puas..
title: Kamar Nyaman Serela

text: Kami menginap disini untuk liburan akhir tahun. Tiba di bandung masih pagi sekitar jam 10, kami masih belum bisa cek in dan kami maklumi hingga pukul 2 siang kami baru bisa masuk. Kami mendapatkan kamar di lantai 5. Kamar tidurnya sangat kecil tapi ok lah untuk sebuah budget hotel. Pada sore hari bau masakan sangat menyengat dikamar dan kamar pun perlahan2 berasap putih. Kami komplain ke resepsionis dan mereka mengirimkan Teknisi yang hanya bilang bau nya berasal dari dapur. Lalu kami mencoba untuk pindah kamar. Setelah proses beberapa lama dan mengganggu waktu liburan kami akhirnya kami mendapatkan pula kamar yang lain di lantai 3. Yah pada mulanya tidak ada bau tapi makin lama timbul jg baunya walaupun tidak begitu parah seperti sebelumnya. Kamar mandi kami nilai kurang bersih dan bau. Begitu pula handuk nya. Sangat menjijikan. Di hotel ini ada kolam renang dan menurit saya cukup baik untuk kolam renangnya hanya saja untuk anak2 tolong diperhatikan karena di area ini tidak ada petugas yang mengawasi. Untuk sarapan pagi saya nilai cukup. Varian nya juga cukup pas pas an. Lapangan parkir sangat sangat terbatas. Bagi anda yang datang menggunakan kendaraan sendiri dan datang saat peak season saya tidak merekomendasikan hotel ini karena bisa2 anda pusing hanya untuk memarkirkan kendaraan anda.
title: Gak rekomen

text:
Saya sudah menginap 3x di hotel ini dengan keluarga karena lokasinya yang dekat dengan rumah kerabat. 
Pertama kali kami menginap bulan Mei 2015, kondisi masih tergolong baru,  hotel masih bersih dan pelayanan baik. Saya meminta extra bed dan langsung disediakan. 
Kedua kali kami menginap bulan September 2015, kami mulai merasa kecewa. Kami memesan secara online jauh hari sebelumnya dan sudah meminta extra bed.  Namun saat kamu check-in, resepsionis berkata bahwa extra bed habis. Setelah kami berargumen bahwa kamu sudah memesan jauh hari sebelumnya, akhirnya mereka menyediakan extra bed tersebut. Ketika kami masuk kamar, masih ada handuk kotor dan tidak disediakan sabun serta lap tangan. Kebersihan kamar juga masih kurang. 
Ketiga kali kami menginap bulan November 2015 dan kami memesan secara online lagi.  Kali ini mereka lagi2 menyatakan tidak pernah menyediakan extra bed dan menyarankan kami memesan 1 kamar lagi saja bila tidak cukup. Setelah berargumen panjang, akhirnya mereka beralasan bahwa di hotel ini extra bed tidak ada dan harus meminjam dari sister hotel. Namun pada malam hari mereka kirim 1 extra bed yang tipis dan ukurannya kecil ke kamar kami (lebar 90 cm). Di kamar mandi tidak disediakan handuk tangan lagi. Pada malam minggu, di restoran ada live music yang terdengar cukup keras sampai ke kamar sehingga anak saya sulit untuk tidur, untung jam 22.10 selesai. 

Di luar pengalaman itu, berikut review saya:
Makanan: Sederhana tapi rasa lumayan. 
Kolam renang: Kecil dan hanya ada 1 kedalaman. Jadi tidak cocok untuk anak kecil. 
Resepsionis: Kurang senyum dan kurang ramah.
Parkir: Terbatas.
title: Hotel pas2an...

text: Pada kunjungan kali ini saya merasakan secara keseluruhan biasa saja, hal tersebut dikarenakan beberapa penilaian yang menurun seiring pengalaman yang saya alami kali ini. pada saat check-in saya memesan 3 kamar dan hanya ditemukan 2 kamar yang terbooking, setelah saya berikan bukti tetap saja tidak mempercepat waktu check-in. pagi hari ketika breakfast, ada satu kamar kami yang tidak tercatat, padahal saya sudah membeli include breakfast untuk ketiga kamar yang saya pesan. menu yang disajikan kali ini saya beri nilai biasa saja. lalu setelah sarapan saya melajutkan aktivitas ke kolam renang, kondisi kolam renang ok. pada saat selesai, saya minta handuk. namun handuk ditunggu lama tak kunjung datang, hingga istri saya naik kekamar untuk mengambil handuk yang disediakan di kamar. pada hari itu kebetulan jalan kelenteng digunakan untuk acara kuliner, seluruh tamu diinformasikan agar memindahkan mobil kedepan sekolah yg letaknya tidak jauh, lalu saya memindahkannya. tidak taunya, sampai acara sudah dimulai, posisi keluar mobil tidak terhalang oleh acara kuliner tersebut. jadi informasi yang disampaikan dari pihak hotel tidak sesuai. mohon manajemen hotel dapat menjaga kualitas pelayanan dari hari ke hari. agar pelanggan bisa puas pada setiap kunjungan
title: Kunjungan yang terasa biasa

text:
saya memesan 4 kamar di Serela. Ketika masuk ke kamar mandi Bau Pesing sangat menyengat. saya kira hanya dikamar saya saja yang Bau pesing namun ketika saya menumpang kamar mandi di kamar lain kamar mandinya pun Bau Pesing menyengat. 

Parkir susah karena tempat parkir yang sempit. Jam 07.00 pagi saya mendengar kamar sebelah diketuk oleh orang hotel untuk dapat dipindahkan mobilnya. Ruangan tidak kedap suara jadi apabila ada orang yang berbicara di koridor hotel bisa terdengar sampai kamar. 

Kamarnya kecil sekali. Peralatan seperti sandal dan sabunnya pun minimalis jadi jangan mengharapkan banyak hal.
title: Kamar Mandi Bau Pesing , Parkir susah

2. Koneksi internet di room tidak memuaskan. Masih wajar dan bisa terjadi di hotel manapun

3. Saya tidak bisa mengeluarkan mobil dari parkiran di pagi hari (4.30), mobil terhalang oleh 4 mobil tamu lainnya yang diparkir d jalur keluar masuk parkiran, ketika meminta tolong security, dia tidak bisa memindahkan mobil-mobil tersebut dengan alasan tidak bisa mengemudikan. Dengan nada seenaknya menyuruh saya untuk memindahkan semua mobil itu dan harus dkembalikan ke tempat semula. Bukan hanya itu, dengan seenaknya pula security membentak teman saya yang mengemudikan kendaraan yang akan keluar. Hal yang tidak wajar dan tidak pernah saya dapatkan di hotel manapun

title: Room wasn't ready

text: This is the Budget version of Serela,not the same as the one that I stayed in Medan! So I kept my expectations low! Location was very near to Chinatown and nice street stalls all nearly! The pool was under maintenance when I was there! Yes the towels were brown and smell chlorine and there was not fridge! But price was very good though!
title: Okay Hotel

text:
This is my second nite here. Right after i talk to Receptionist about what happen today. Well. Ive booked 4 room for my Company at 28-30 April.

I stayed at room 512. We check in at 29 early morning 2am from Jakarta. After process check in i got no towel in my room also there's broken shower which waiting for repair from engineer. Why?  Why they didnt check for all preparation? 

Then early morning 6am until 8 am.  We start to get down for having breakfast, well this is very unexpected and uncomfortable case. 

1. Milk for sereal too watery i think they mix water inside milk.  What a shame 
2. Salad bar only stand for Onion and Red pepper Green pepper and bowl of lettuce 
3. No Sausage????? 
4. They only have CHICKEN ROAST AND EGG for protein
5. No pastry or dessert
6. Infused water was so awful : purple colour?  Oh please. Taste so horrible.
7. they dont clear up our dirty plate. 
8. They dont turn up the light. (very improper and just not ready to serve us)

Actually,  i always feel happy and comfy everytime im stay with KAGUM HOTEL group thats why i recommend Serela for my bos and also my collage to spend our longweekend here. 

But after this case. I really doubt about it. 

Please dont let us dissapointed anymore. 

( i will upload the picture of horrible breakfast if they still serve those dish for tomorrow )
title: Out of my expectation

text: Actually, i had to stay here last year in 2016. Well, i almost not any comments for the Serella Waringin Bandung. I stay for 2 night in superior room. The rooms are awesome, but not for the view. The staff was very nice. and they have a good breakfast also. overall, for the cheap price this hotel one of a my big recomendation for stay in Bandung.
title: Unexpected Hotel

text: Came here because I have business nearby, booked one superior room no bfast, because i have to go back jakarta early in the morning next day, and surprisingly I got small but nice room, the pillows and sheet are very soft, staff are friendly and they have a small indoor pool, but I didn't tried becuse the bandung was cold and rain at that time, didn't tried the food. But I had ordered 1 cup of cappucino , but that was horrible, the coffee is getting cold, flavor is so bad its like not made from coffee machine,  but overall is good...
title: Good

text: As a semi-backpacker, it is important for me to stay at a hotel whose location is strategic, near to the city centers (I mean foot-friendly) and that offers comfort. The hotel is located near to things I love: good food, city centers and attractions. The room was sufficiently good with the pretty big window they got so I could see the mountainous view and planes taking off and landing (yes, it's near to the airport). Moreover, they got an indoor swimming pool which is good and have no worries about swimming while it's raining. Just a minor issue that the wifi wasn't really that fast, so yeah that's quiet disturbing. But all in all, it was a good stay.
title: Right Hotel with Right Location

text:
I stay here on february 2017,i forget to say thank you to all of staf there for all staff frontliner and especially for service staff is very helpful and friendly to help me during i stay in there.I got her name card at restaurant and for the next maybe i'll be came to this hotel if i visit at bandung.
Thank you serela..
title: Good Hotel for stay with family

text:
Spend a night here and everything is great..nice location, many food stalls or small restaurants nearby..friendly staff..
Only the toilet is too close to wall..
Other than that, this hotel is recommended!
title: Recommended

text: The room was good enough with quiet atmosphere. But I think it was too small because I had small space in the room. But so far so good. The bathroom was clean and the facilities was worth the price...

text: The hotel was quite good. Breakfast is also delicious and i enjoyed the breakfast very much. The room is clean. I called the receptionist twice to help us with water heater but no one came. Otherwise this hotel would be perfect for me.
title: Leisure

text: As requested, I got a king size bed and non smoking room. As I had to check out at 4.30 a.m., I was given a takeaway breakfast, in fact 2! The front desk also arranged for a cab that came perfectly on time. Location is only 10 minutes from the train station, mini buses take you to various areas in.. Over all is good thank you serela waringin next time I will come back againt.

text: They're using good materials for our room.. but they dont have liquid soap 😭 they only give us that solid one, which is I like to use it for wastafel use. They have good location, for using taxi of course, not for walking.

text: Im coming on 17-18 sept 2016. Booked for 2 rooms. there is too much ant in the room, and there is only 1 toothbrush, and 1 hotel sandal. I even can't lock my door from inside, and the bell is not working. the swimming pool is quite small, I think it only can use for 1-2 adults for swim.
title: 17-18 September 2016.

text: stayed at serela waringin for one night. I choosed this hotel because its cheal only 380.000 idr / night include breakfast. And from internet the hotel look like good The location of this hotel is near Pasar Baru. & Paskal Pood market I Like
title: Friendly & Good Value

text:
The hotel room is incredibly petit. I had 3 rooms that night. The locatiion though is at the china town just across bintang nasi campur. We had our rooms without breakfast and look around at breakfast time. Just to see the morning market wiith local hawkers. Good noodle, porridge, ambokue and ketupat curry. Next is the local kue stall serving delicious local petit fours and
 Bread.
title: Small hotel in a foodie district

text: Great hotel but at front hotel the goverment change the material of road so i must take a walk by foot from parking area about 50-80m. Lighting on shower room is bad and the koridor is dark. I still can hear a voice from my side room. Breakfast is very good at all. Fast response. Good at all.
title: good
partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan Tiket.com

text: The strong point of this hotel is its location near to food central in Bandung. You can walk less than 5 minutes to find the restaurants nearby, both on left and right side. But, there are a lot of homeworks should be done by the operator. The car parking area was one of "disaster", you can't easily park in and/or out.The room, with double bed was quite nice, but the twin bed room was "horrible" with the placement of reading lamp in the middle of the bed, because the side space between wall and the bed were not spacious. TV channel was OK, but the housekeeping team should paid more attention to the set up. I have stayed more than once in this hotel, and the room amenities wasn't the same between the first time and the second time. And I have to ask for slippers on the next morning because they didn't provide since the first night. The breakfast buffet was very average with "weird" sitting arrangement. The food and presentation were poor. And the toilet near the mini pool was dirty and messy. Hopefully they can improve the service for my next stay
title: Good Located Budget Hotel especially for Food Traveler

text: I stayed in this hotel at the second day of Eid Al Mubarrak Day in national public holiday  (Lebaran) which is a peak seasons. I think this hotel is comfortable enough, but I have a lil bit dissapointed with the front liner staff, when I'm just arrived in Bandung at I have calling the receptionist hotel to ensured the room that we order. We order 2 twins and 1 Deluxe, but when we arrived inthe hotel they say there is no room for Deluxe, and we don't get any solutions except take the twins rooms. It's so annoying! Because I have one toodler and it makes me wake up every hour to make sure my baby is sleep well and doesn't fall from the bed! And the smell of the Pool was a lil bit rancidity. Maybe it have to drain every day in high seasons, I don't care if you never drain your pool on weekday but in high seasons and weekends, you have to drain it every day! because many of people and children are swimming in the pool.
title: Comfortable hotel but...

text: I had an opportunity to stay at Serela Waringin for one night and i ordered it via mobile apps. It was quick & easy. I requested Deluxe Room with double-bed. The room is spacious enough and the bed is comfortable. The bathroom is clean but i found the shower was not warm enough. The air conditioner working well. I had a good sleep here. Customer service is good too. Too bad i didn't try the breakfast so i have no idea about the food quality. The hotel location is near with a lot of attraction (food street, shopping mall, church, vihara, etc).
title: Affordable Price Yet So Comfortable

text:
We found this hotel by looking at Agoda.com and the price for a night is affordable for a couples. 

The room was spacious enough, the bed was comfortable, and tidy room. The check-in processed was smooth and faat as we expected due to late arrival of us. 

If you are looking for an affordable hotel and comfortable one in the city area, you might considering Serela Waringin as your choice ❤️
title: Affordable and Comfortable City Hotel

text: i'm traveled with my wife. i think this was standard quality hotel, its okay but i had some problem at my stay. first i had problem with my wash sink, soaked with coffee and not drain well. the room was very smelly with tobacco. location was okay but very limited parking lot.
title: average hotel

text:
The room isn't as big as the pictures had before. They said it was the king one, but I thought it's just in Queen size. And when I just entered the room, the sink was dirty with the coffee powder (it must be the guest that stayed before) and they said they want to fix it but they didn't come back again to fix until the day we check out. 

The swimming pool wasn't big as showed below. It just enough for 10 people max. And the towel was smelly seems like a rug than towel (as for me). The parking lot was also too small so we have to give the key to the security as if in case it needed.

I would never come back here again. For sure.
title: Unexpected & disappointed.

text: I stayed for 3 nights at this hotel. Room size is small with standard facilities and needs a little improvement in cleanliness. But the staff were friendly and quick response, quality is quite satisfactory. For breakfast, the choice is very varied with a different menu every day and it did not disappoint in taste. There are two minimarket next to the hotel and it is easy to find food around the hotel.
title: Great service hotel

text:
Luckily I've got IDR 163 K (room only) through the one of online travel agent. Well it really worth for the money. Normally they put IDR 300-400 K. 

Anyway, I was back because I found the lowest price. Same like previous review, actually I enjoyed the room with nice furniture with new furnish. But still found the front desk 
who still chaos on check in procedure. I booked 2 rooms with separate vouchers, but he had 1 voucher of my reservation for sure. Just let him to check it again, and he really sure that my reservation was only 1 room. Then I told him to check carefully, and he was really sure to convince me that he was right. He told me with high tone that make me quite inconvenience. 
Until I showed him my email voucher that I've booked 2 rooms.

Really enjoyed the rooms, but seems the employees isn't mature enough of their hospitality.
title: Get Low Price

text:
We there with my colleagues during our business trip, the client had provided us this Hotel for accommodation.  Saw from Internet that the room was OK but when we arrived there is was dissapointing. When I entered my room and was stadium looking at the window I saw something moving on the bed, it was red ants.....not a lot but there are some on the bed and after I fliped the bed cover, I found more ....and with some strands of hair....long hair....

The AC was not cold at all despite the temperature was set to 16 degree, the TV was buzzing and we can't hear the volume as the buzzing sound is louder. ...

The lighting was dim, even for the bathroom.....there is no shelving in the shower area to put your soap or shampoo....you have to put these on the floor....

The lobby are without AC during weekdays, the breakfast area was supplied with AC but it was not turn on and the lights were off also.....
title: There are better Hotel with similar rates

text: Went to stay because of the super sell promo but they only available as a twin bedded room.. The room was super small but a/c unit was cold enough.. Didn't buy the bfast package so cannot comments and overall just ok...
title: An Ok hotel

text:
Was here with my husband for our Bandung trip. We spent 4 nights at Serela Waringin. The location is not really strategic but with the price we got from booking.com I can't complain more.. I spent RM85 per night for a deluxe room including breakfast. The room is big enough for us to walk around and even after we placed our luggage. We can even sat on the floor while eating our meals.  Review for the room 520. 
Air conditioning : good
Hot shower  : good
Towel : good
Wi fi : good
View : temple and town area 
Toiletries : provided 
Overall we satisfied with our 5d4n stay in this hotel. Reception staff is alsi friendly. They can help you with the taxi if you need one.
Next to this hotel there are 2 convenience stores .
title: Recommended hotel

text:
location is not too strategic if you travel by car, only one way in and sometimes a road block on its main street (so we have to circle around and enter from another way), another drawbacks are parking lot, not adequate especially for the weekend where many guest coming (but their parking staff a.k.a security will charmingly help to valet your car), there is convenient store next to the hotel and some restaurants, so you don't have to starve in the middle of the night.

amenities were good during my stay, there were hairdryer and cotton-buds (items that tiny but quite thoughtful), beds are very comfort and wifi connection is quite good (2-3 bars in the room), hot water was not working during my stay (a little bit cold to warm)
title: good hotel for vacation

text:
To be honest, I can't really decide what to feel regarding my stay here. To keep it short, I'll go by TripAdvisor's guide to writing a great review :p

1. The Service: 9 point from me. They were friendly, fast-responding, I'm particulary impressed by the restaurant staff lady who convinced me that they were able to provide me with plain rice, then that they only served fried rice and yellow rice.
2. The Room: 8 from me. I stayed in a superior room, it's rather small, but not with just basic facilities. I loved the bed, it was super comfort! The bathroom is equipped with two types of shower.
3. Location & amenities: near Pasir Kaliki a.k.a. Paskal, so it's kinda easy for you to travel here and there. There are Indomaret and Alfamart right next to the hotel, some chinese food restaurants - a bit pricey, though.
4. What I liked best: 
I loved how they provide a hairdryer in the bathroom! Oh, also the cottonbud. I mean, those trivial yet thoughtful things.
I adored Mr Julius, the security guy who's working hard to make sure the cars go in and out easily.
I liked the restaurant, they serve somewhat various tasty food.

What I liked least:
They forgot to put the sandals in the room, but they quickly fixed it.
The parking lot is too cramped, and the exit is also the entrance! So, when we checked out on Sunday (they host a church there), it was almost like a traffic frenzy for poor Mr Julius.
The hot water didn't really come out as "hot", it was almost lukewarm. But it was fine by me, as long as it didn't make me freeze.
The pool water was too cold! Or maybe it was like that in every hotel in Bandung?
Oh, and the worst, they said they provide free wifi in every room. Nah, it didn't work in my room (2nd floor). I had to stand by my door just to get an average connection! Luckily, my 3G connection was good in the room.

Overall, I gave Serela Waringin 7,5 out of 10.
title: It's OK

text:
Was staying in this hotel last February. The trip was actually meant for visiting the city to relax after a while. When the good rate came to my computer screen, I simply booked a room from Thursday to Sunday (long weekend).
Turned out the Chinese New Year celebration was right at the street outside of the hotel all through the week, because nearby there is this popular temple or something. The small street which was packed with parked cars already, was almost impossible to penetrate when I and girlfriend were planning to go out. Thanks to the hotel staff who offered us a quick shortcut, with their vehicles for no extra fee, we were able to get out from the crowd in a matter of minutes.
Big thanks to Mr. Arif, apparently the hotel's manager or chief, who amid lots of requests from the guests, directed us with clarity and smile on how to escape the crowded street or simply to enjoy the celebration from the hotel. The hotel itself is alright for its budget rate, probably because it is basically a new establishment for the interior decorations were shiny. 
The above extra service, however, was really something. I hope other hotel can copy this kind of treat to guests, because guests are always king.
title: Unexpected Service For Budget Rate!

text:
This is a very late review. I went to Serela Waringin on November 2014 on a short escape with hubby and 2 daughter. Bandung is my second city as I studied there for 5 years.

I've booked the hotel through their website - Kagum Hotel and received good room rate for 1 night stay at their superior room. We drive to Jakarta and when entering the city, we were confused on how to get to the hotel, traffic jam all over the area, not to mention those confusing one way street that kept us round and round. finally - thanks to waze - we arrived around check in time.

we were surprise that the lobby looks "tiny" compare to the other Kagum hotel I stayed earlier, Grand Serela Setiabudhi was one example. Check in process was fast, after they received a print out of my confirmation letter, 2 master key was handed to me.

The room - was a surprise. It was nicely decor, Kagum style, with a big window from the floor up to the ceiling (but not much to see outside - a couple of warung and construction). nice comfortable bed and various TV channel, it was a 4* for me.

The bathroom - this was the downside. the hot water did not work properly. they send one staff up to my room and he fixed it - one hour later.

Breakfast was nice. they have egg station, my fave! the other bfast menu was adequate, plenty of bread spread, some porridge and also buffet spread. 

a plus size that they have a small swimming pool just near the breakfast area - it was semi indoor on 2nd fl, with 1,5 m height and a freezing water  - but my kids still swim after breakfast.

all in all, it was a nice stay - we sleep well and we're happy when we check out, so worth the pay!
title: Adequate Hotel

text: we stayed for 1 night only on the 27th of feb. i was shocked witht the cleanliness of the room, i spotted some spots on the bed sheets, curtain and the bed side table were very dusty, the carpet was the same. whats even worse was the Towel, sorry to say it should never be use as towel to dry up your body. even a bathmath in a guest house is way cleaner than that. i wish i had brought my own.towels look like have been used to mop dirty floor. I know the price is cheap, but doesnt mean the clinliness ignored. its the most vital thing beside service. this hotel is 3/10 on cleanliness.Very disappointed
title: Need urgent improvement on cleanliness

text:
Stay for 4 days to attend family gathering on Bandung.. the staff is very nice and helpfull..
I rent two rooms..
The rooms is small almost same for all kagum hotels group like neo, golden flower..
Pros :
- it's has hairdryer on the bathroom
- it's near vihara samudra bhakti
- near chinatown
- just across the street s selling nasi campur bintang
Cons :
- the rooms is dirty
- the water is looks yellow, like well water
- the breakfast is quite good excepts for the milk (almost the same like mineral water, doesn't feel like fresh milk) and the scramble eggs is tasteless
title: Family vacation

text:
This is a kind of budget hotel. We got small twin bedroom with two 90x200cm beds, the space left is only for you to walk, you can't put extra bed on the floor. They have a lot of tv channel, unfortunatelly the picture was fuzzy, and they could not fix it.

There is swimming pool, around 3x15m, with very very cold water. But I did enjoy swimming there with my wife. Jump, swim 20 times, stop. That was how We did.

We did not have breakfast at the hotel.

Apart from that, I did enjoy the surrounding area. It's like my neighbourhood when I was a child.

In the morning, in front of the hotel you can have bubur, lontong sayur, batagor, ambokue, cakue, and lots of other traditional food and cake.

At night, you can walk (about 10 minutes) to Jalan Gardu Jati or further to  Jalan cibadak (add 10 minutes) where you can find more hawkers that sells onde, nasi campur, swike, etc. You can also walk around 10 minutes to Pasar Andir to get Martabak Andir, one of the best martabak in Bandung.

If you like pork, in front of the hotel there is Nasi Campur Bintang (one of the most famous nasi campur in Bandung) and not far from that, there is also Nasi Campur Kelenteng (they said that they are the first to sell roast pork in Bandung).

Next to the hotel, there are also 2 convenient stores.
title: Simple hotel, nice environment

text:
Pros:
- Location was great, next to Chinatown and 23 Paskal Mal. Walkable to Food Street at Jalan Sudirman & Jalan Cibadak. 
We can even walk to Alun-Alun (around 30 minutes walk).
- Many food seller around hotel
- Friendly staff (front desk & security are helpful with smile on their face)

Cons:
- Room is not very clean. Carpet was stained, bed sheet a little bit dusty, towel has stain on it.
- Access to area was crowded and parking space is not enough (but since the staff can help on parking, this was not a hassle)
- Hot water doesn't work well (only luke warm) on busy hours
title: Very Close to Chinatown Bandung

text: We spent 2 days here. Over all the hotel was great. My kids love the swimming pool. The room was quite spacious. Friendly staff but not so quick response. Wifi not so strong but it s ok. Close to Paskal Foodmarket

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Stayed here for 3 nights from 2-5 oct and got a very good deal from online travel agent, only 179.000IDR or around $14 per night. I got twin room without breakfast.
The room is quite small (bcoz I choose the supersell ones) but enough if you don't bring too many things or children with you and had standard amenities for hotel room. Too bad I didn't get room slippers. They had hairdryers and cotton buds in the bathroom so it's a big plus point for me. I got room no.537 on 5th floor with windows facing Tangkuban Perahu mountain (and some other mountains). The bedsheet, pillowsheet and towels are a bit old and not sparking white anymore, but it didn't smell and still feels clean.
I have a few issues with the air con & shower, which refused to adjust to my desired temperature. The air con is too good it makes me freezing even though I've set it to higher temp, and the water in the shower changing from ice cold to burning hot, it's so hard to set it to warm. But thankfully the staffs are so friendly & helpful it covers for the room dissapointment. The location also quite good, a lot of restaurants nearby (but most of all non-halal/served pork) and convenience store right beside the hotel.
I will definitely stay here again if I'm backpackering again or going alone to Bandung, and maybe try a bigger room if I'm going with my parents.
title: Not the best but worth the price

owner_response.text:

We would also like to apologize for the various issues that you have encountered such as the AC and the shower, we will immediately put our people to work on that so that your issues will not be repeated again to our guests.

We are looking forward to welcoming you, and hopefully your parents as well, in our Hotel in the immediate future.

Best regards,

text:
we stayed for 1 night only due to a full schedule. booked this hotel since it was close to an event place. it isn't by a big street so it isn't noisy with traffic. 
Lot's of food stalls by the hotel and a convinience store right next door.
Room is small but clean and comfortable enough. 
Would come back if we need a short stay.
title: 1 comfortable night

text: I stayed at serela waringin for one night. I choosed this hotel because its cheal only 300.000 idr / night include breakfast. And from internet the hotel look like good and big. The location of this hotel is near braga. But around hotel its little bit dirty. Hotel had small parking lot. You must parked your car in road. Hotel its look like in the internet but more darker like less of light. Hotel had small swimming pool to bad cause the pool on maintenance. Room was nice i got room in 6 floor. From my room i can saw chineese graveyard. Breakfast was nice like standard budget hotel.
title: Bandung Story at Serela Waringin

text:
Summary:
Time spent 4 Day 3 Night,
Room floor and carpet not clean (room 326),
Wifi on room area are unreachable or often not working,
Cracked pillar (both 207 and 326),
Mosquito and ants on room (room 326),
Flies on the breakfast area,
No variation on breakfast menu (though the fried rice is tasty)

The price is pretty cheap. At the first day, i came for check in and everything was fine. Up until i enter my room 326. There are so many tiny rubbish on the floor, the room are smelly, and some crack on the pillar. I read people's review about how unclean the rooms are but i didnt expect it to be that bad. After that i try the wifi, the signal is there but the whole 3rd floor have no internet connection. Since it is almost midnight already, so i decided to bear with it and go to sleep. The toothbrush and shampoo are only 1. Though we are two people on twin room, are they forcing us to share the toothbrush? After i take bath i found out that many ants covering my bread which i just left for 20 minutes. It is a rare view indeed to found ants in hotel room. There are also some ants on the beds with several mosquitoes.

On day 2 morning, i went down to complaint and they want to change my room and i asked for any room on 2nd floor which later on i got 207. On 207 the room smell normal unlike the 326. No ant and mosquito issue as well. Several rubbish on the floor but it is not too bad compare to the 326. The wall pillar are cracked as well though. They gave 2 toothbrush and 2 shampoo on this 207 as well so i dont need to share toothbrush like day 1.

On the breakfast area look fine, up until i spot flies on the desert area. I complaint the FnB staff on breakfast area and he only swing his hand to scare the flies, BUT he didnt throw away those dessert that already ruined by flies. And after 2 minute i checked that area again. With an expected result, i found the flies coming back to the deserts.

The breakfast also lack on food variation. Everyday there are: rice, fried rice, noodle/bihun/kwetiaw, vegetable, chicken, breads, porridge. The difference are on what kind of vegetable and how the cook the chicken, plus nasi kuning/omellete station.
The chicken stock for porridge are used from the chicken that serve on the main area so the chicken already taste rather plain. Beverage always same.

The day 3 and day 4 pass with same issue on the breakfast area.
title: Cleanliness is the main problem

text:
Im take standard room, so based from my visit, myy point from one to five :

1. Cleanliness : **
- bed have little stain, and some pen dirt. Futhermore i found red ants travelling in my bed. Suck, quite dissapointing.
- carpet quite dirty,
- towell so thin, not fresh clean,
- bathroom, old, the corner of floor dirty 
- furniture have few thin dust.

2. Hotel rates : ***
Anyhow this hotel have quite good value for money, but room cleanliness is a MUST! 

3. Location : ***
Not the best location, it located in south old district, but still easy access to main town with car ride. If you dont bring personal car, maybe taxi is best alternative.

4. Staff hospitality, response  and service : ****
Good enough, warm staff. When we found out room dont give us hotel sandal, we infrom this, and they give fast response. Next time dont forget it!

5. Food : ****
Anyhow we are pleased with food here, quite good for rates they give, good enough : )

6. Layout and room space : ** / ***
- Good layout
- room space soo small
- no view
- decent shower, like it.
- warm water is good (some hotel, even they are good and pricey, still missed and have trouble with this feature sometimes)

7.  Facilities : ***
- pool, so small. When im arrive at night, still under maintenance, but in the morning they are ready. Kid pool size. Anyhow its good though it shallow.
- small parking area
- no balkon, so had to smoke outside room, at pool restaurant (outer area) or lounge.
- for wifi, they give me id and pass, but when i try login, it never done. Lol whatever. Quite dissapointing.

5. Overall from one to ten points : 7, 3
Plus for quite good rates, food and staff hospitality, 
Minus for cleanliness, they forgot to accomodate us hotel sandal, room so small, and bad towel. Please improve it!

Best regard
Raditya
title: Quite value and good hotel, anyway room cleanliness must improve!

text: The room is fine, looks good with the style, nice view from 5th floor. But It was horrible when you found the room with empty amenities. When you asked the the front desk, then the room attendant filled it right away but he didn't knock the door, just opened and place it that way without apologize and say something. On the afternoon, another guest opened my room where the front desk gave them the same room with my room that already occupied. Report to the front desk, they just excused of the system and previous shifting who did an error. What a mess coordination. My room 550, check in on November 27, 2015.
title: Chaos Coordination
